comment.author: 18111421@N08
comment._content: I have this photograph as it features my mother who is on the left of the women seated on the ground.  She lived to be 99 years old and passed away in April 2012.  She told many stories of her time at agricultural college.

comment.author: 18101452@N03
comment._content: My twin (posted above) and I will be visiting both PRONI and our late mother's agricultural college next week.
